Constructors in ch.ethz.rtc.kernel with parameters of type Curve
CurveSegmentIterator(Curve c)
          Creates a CurveSegmentIterator that iterates over all Segments in the passed Curve.
CurveSegmentIterator(Curve c, double xMax)
          Creates a CurveSegmentIterator that iterates over all Segments in the passed Curve, up to x <= xMax.
CurveSubSegmentIterator(Curve a, Curve b)
          Creates an CurveSubSegmentIterator that iterates over all Subsegments of the Curves a and b.

Subsegments are defined as follows:
X_A is the ordered list of the x-values of the start-points of all Segments of Curve a.
X_B is the ordered list of the x-values of the start-points of all Segments of Curve b.
X_AB is the ordered union of X_A and X_B without any duplicates.
X_AB contains the x-values of the start and end points of all Subsegments of the Curve a and b.
CurveSubSegmentIterator(Curve a, Curve b, double xMax)
          Creates an CurveSubSegmentIterator that iterates over all Subsegments of the Curves a and b, from x=0 up to and including x=xMax.

Subsegments are defined as follows:
X_A is the ordered list of the x-values of the start-points of all CurveSegments of Curve a from x=0 up to x=xMax.
X_B is the ordered list of the x-values of the start-points of all CurveSegments of Curve b from x=0 up to x=xMax.
X_AB is the ordered union of X_A and X_B without any duplicates.
X_AB contains the x-values of the start and end points of all Subsegments of the Curve a and b.
CurveSubSegmentIteratorInv(Curve a, Curve b)
          Creates an CurveSubSegmentIteratorInv that iterates over all vertical Subsegments of the Curves a and b.

Vertical Subsegments are defined as follows:
Y_A is the ordered list of the y-values of the start-points of all Segments of Curve a.
Y_B is the ordered list of the y-values of the start-points of all Segments of Curve b.
Y_AB is the ordered union of Y_A and Y_B without any duplicates.
Y_AB contains the y-values of the start and end points of all Subsegments of the Curve a and b.
CurveSubSegmentIteratorInv(Curve a, Curve b, double yMax)
          Creates an CurveSubSegmentIteratorInv that iterates over all vertical Subsegments of the Curves a and b, from x=0 up to and including x=xMax.
